# calcy-math
## _A Simple Math Library_

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger)

## Installation

Install calcymath

```
cd my_app
pip install calcymath
```

Importing calcymath

```
from calcymath import *
```

Running Server

```
python app.py
```
